description:
And the winner is … The 2016 American Music Awards welcomed music’s best and brightest on Sunday, November 20, to L.A.’s Microsoft Theater, and some of your favorite artists were nominated. Even better? Bruno Mars, Lady Gaga and Justin Bieber were on the star-studded performance lineup, and model Gigi Hadid and comedian Jay Pharoah hosted the event.获奖的是……11月20日周日，在洛杉矶的微软剧院举行的2016全美音乐奖（颁奖典礼）迎来了最闪亮最优秀的艺人们，一些你最爱的艺人均榜上有名。更棒的有的还拿奖了！模特Gigi Hadid和喜剧人Jay Pharoah主持这场盛宴；火星哥、嘎嘎姐、比伯都有登台表演！
 
以下为奖项提名获奖名单：
 
Artist of the Year年度最佳艺人
Adele
Beyoncé
Justin Bieber
Drake
Selena Gomez
Ariana Grande -- WINNER
Twenty One Pilots
Carrie Underwood
The Weeknd
 
FAVORITE SONG- POP/ROCK年度最热单曲- 流行/摇滚
Adele, “Hello”
Justin Bieber, “Love Yourself”
Drake Featuring Wizkid & Kyla, “One Dance”
 
New Artist of the Year年度最佳新人
Alessia Cara
The Chainsmokers
DNCE
Shawn Mendes
ZAYN -- WINNER
 
Favorite Male Artist: Pop/Rock最受欢迎的男歌手:流行/摇滚
Justin Bieber -- WINNER
Drake 打雷
The Weeknd 盆栽精

Favorite Female Artist: Pop/Rock最受欢迎的女艺人:流行/摇滚
Adele 阿黛尔
Selena Gomez -- WINNER 赛琳娜·戈麦斯
Rihanna 蕾哈娜

Favorite Pop/Rock Album最受欢迎的流行/摇滚专辑
Adele, 25
Justin Bieber, Purpose -- WINNER
Drake, Views
 
Favorite Duo/Group: Pop/Rock最受欢迎的组合/乐队:流行/摇滚
The Chainsmokers
DNCE
Twenty One Pilots -- WINNER

Favorite Female Country Artist最受欢迎的乡村女歌手
Kelsea Ballerini
Cam
Carrie Underwood -- WINNER
 
Favorite Male Country Artist最受欢迎的乡村男歌手
Luke Bryan
Thomas Rhett
Blake Shelton -- WINNER
 
Favorite Country Duo/Group最受欢迎的乡村歌手组合/乐队
Florida Georgia Line -- WINNER
Old Dominion
Zac Brown Band

Favorite Country Album最受欢迎的乡村音乐专辑
Luke Bryan, Kill the Lights
Chris Stapleton, Traveller
Carrie Underwood, Storyteller -- WINNER

FAVORITE SONG - COUNTRY最受欢迎乡村单曲
Florida Georgia Line, “H.O.L.Y.”
Tim McGraw, “Humble And Kind” -- WINNER
Thomas Rhett, “Die A Happy Man”

Favorite Artist: Adult Contemporary最受欢迎的歌手:成人当代
Adele -- WINNER
Rachel Platten
Meghan Trainor

FAVORITE MALE ARTIST – SOUL/R&B最受欢迎灵魂乐/R&B男性艺人
Chris Brown -- WINNER
Bryson Tiller
The Weeknd
 
FAVORITE FEMALE ARTIST – SOUL/R&B最受欢迎灵魂乐/R&B女性艺人
Beyoncé
Janet Jackson
Rihanna -- WINNER
 
Favorite Soul/R&B Album最受欢迎的灵魂乐/ R&B专辑
Beyoncé, Lemonade
Rihanna, Anti -- WINNER
Bryson Tiller, T R A P S O U L
 
FAVORITE SONG – SOUL/R&B最受欢迎灵魂乐/R&B单曲
Drake Featuring Wizkid & Kyla, “One Dance”
Rihanna Featuring Drake, “Work” -- WINNER
Bryson Tiller, “Don’t”
 
Favorite Artist: Rap/Hip-Hop最受欢迎的歌手：说唱/嘻哈
Drake -- WINNER
Fetty Wap
Future
 
Favorite Rap/Hip-Hop Album最受欢迎的说唱/嘻哈专辑
Drake, Views -- WINNER
Drake & Future, What A Time To Be Alive
Fetty Wap, Fetty Wap
 
FAVORITE SONG – RAP/HIP-HOP最受欢迎说唱/Hip-Hop单曲
Desiigner, “Panda”
Drake, “Hotline Bling” -- WINNER
Fetty Wap, “679”
 
FAVORITE ARTIST - ALTERNATIVE ROCK最受欢迎另类摇滚艺人
Coldplay
Twenty One Pilots -- WINNER
X Ambassadors

TOP SOUNDTRACK最受欢迎的原声歌曲
Purple Rain -- WINNER
Star Wars: The Force Awakens
Suicide Squad: The Album
 
Collaboration of the Year年度最佳合作
The Chainsmokers Featuring Daya, “Don’t Let Me Down”
Drake Featuring Wizkid & Kyla, “One Dance”
Fifth Harmony Featuring Ty Dolla $ign, “Work From Home” -- WINNER
Rihanna Featuring Drake, “Work”
Meghan Trainor Featuring John Legend, “Like I’m Gonna Lose You”

Favorite Artist: Latin最受欢迎的歌手:拉丁
J Balvin
Enrique Iglesias -- WINNER
Nicky Jam

Favorite Artist: Contemporary Inspirational最受欢迎的歌手：当代灵感音乐
Lauren Daigle
Hillsong UNITED -- WINNER
Chris Tomlin
 
TOUR OF THE YEAR年度巡演
Beyoncé -- WINNER 碧昂斯（获奖）
Madonna 麦当娜
Bruce Springsteen & the E Street Band 布鲁斯·斯普林斯汀&东大街乐队

title: 2016全美音乐奖获奖名单：比伯这次厉害了！
